channel.title: Need help with Welcome Messages
channel.description:
well, what i was hoping to do was make it so that when the owner of a server logs in, it says like: Welcome back, Owner (name) This is proving to be a little more difficult than i expected.. lol. also i would like to know how to do it for individual names too.
Thanks

item.title: Need help with Welcome Messages
item.dc:creator: @Jonny_Flee Jonny_Flee
item.description:
@Jonny_Flee wrote:

Thanks i guess, though i cant quite understand how to do it for one player, like the co owner, who has the same rank as owner…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Welcome Messages
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

You would use an if statement for their playerRights. ie, if their playerRights are 3, you’d do something along the lines of;

if(playerRights == 3) {
    statements; // this would be your sendMessage, or whatever else. sendMessage("Hi "+playerName); etc
}

== = equals
>= = greator than or equals
<= = less than or equals
For >= or <= you could just use greator than or less than (> or <)

As well, this would go where your original welcome messages are.

Read full topic
